reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Cambiamenti climatici e foreste montane- II fase

description.narrative: Promozione della sostenibilità ambientale .Migliorare i mezzi di sostentamento delle comunità montane nelle regioni chiave del mondo, rafforzando nel contempo la gestione sostenibile degli ecosistemi pertinenti.

The aim of this second phase is to strengthen the impact and to expand the geographical scope of the project’s first phase, along its original three outputs: i)Improve cooperation among the member countries of the Mountain Partnership and the Global Island Partnership, through systematic dialogue and knowledge-sharing focused on management issues of fragile ecosystems. ii) Strengthen value chains of selected mountain products.iii) Improve the environmental and social sustainability of the REDD+ mechanism for Reducing Emissions from Deforestation and forest Degradation in Papua New Guinea (PNG).

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
FAO - ORGANIZZAZIONE DELLE NAZIONI UNITE PER L'ALIMENTAZIONE E L'AGRICOLTURA

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, ensure the conservation of mountain ecosystems, including their biodiversity, in order to enhance their capacity to provide benefits that are essential for sustainable development
Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

Promote mechanisms for raising capacity for effective climate change-related planning and management in least developed countries and small island developing States, including focusing on women, youth and local and marginalized communities
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
